text: The District of Bragança () is in northeast Portugal. It is on the border with Spain. The district capital is the city of Bragança. == Municipalities == The district has 10 municipalities: * Alfândega da Fé * Bragança * Carrazeda de Ansiães * Freixo de Espada à Cinta * Macedo de Cavaleiros * Miranda do Douro * Mirandela * Mogadouro * Moncorvo * Vila Flor * Vimioso * Vinhais
title: Bragança District
